summary: Triples the duration of custom fortify enchanting/smithing potions.
descriptionHtml:
If it drives you crazy having to race through the enchanting and smithing interfaces before your potions run out, this mod is for you!  The duration of new custom potions that fortify these skills has been increased from 30 sec.s to 5 minutes.  Now the stats for your cool new enchanted weapon will not be nerfed because you spent a little time trying to decide what to name it!

This mod will not alter any existing potions; it only works for newly crafted potions.  The mod changes properties of the ingredients associated with these potions.  Therefore, it should be fully compatible with mods that alter the properties (e.g., weight, name) of the potions themselves.  Let me know if you run into any conflicts.
author: geegee

files.name: Longer-Lasting Crafting Potions
files.changelogHtml:
Added a small fix to the Sabre Cat Tooth ingredient to be consistent with the Unofficial Skyrim Patch.
Changed ingredient cost to be consistent with vanilla game.
Changed esp name to be compatible with BOSS sorting, which apparently doesn't like file names that begin with numbers.
